name: IOANNIS SAVVAIDIS
title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
artistBio: Composer drawing on quantum and distributed computing principles to interpret relativistic reality through sound. Creates warped soundscapes that explore the abstract and physical dynamics of motion. Performs live, is a member of UNIX SYSTEMS, and has collaborated with record labels including Anopolis, June, Lower Parts, and Phormix.
engineerBio: Seasoned Infrastructure Engineer with over a decade of experience in Site Reliability Engineering, focusing on building sustainable systems. Dedicated to driving innovation, cultivating a respectful culture, and embracing a multidisciplinary approach to problem-solving. Currently pursuing a Master's in Quantum Computing, researching advanced computational methods.
